title: Homeru Hito Homerareru Hito
alternative_title: 褒めるひと褒められるひと ; Someone Who Praises Someone Who Is Praised ; The Praiser and the Praised
status: 褒めるひと褒められるひと ; Someone Who Praises Someone Who Is Praised ; The Praiser and the Praised
description:
Description :
        A comedy about a workplace that is both funny and comforting. Eiko Ichikawa, a clerk at a toy company, is depressed because even though she does her job well, she is not appreciated, and she is beaten to a pulp by a single mistake."She wants to be praised" - a soliloquy she overhears from her boss, Mr Bando, and this is the start of her daily routine of receiving praise from Mr Bandou! But the way he praises her... he's got a peculiar way of praising her!
